parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "template": "client_welcome_enhanced",
  "to": "{{ $('Split Data Streams').item.json['welcome-data'].email }}",
  "cc": ["{{ $('Split Data Streams').item.json['welcome-data'].account_manager }}@agency.com"],
  "subject": "Welcome to Our Agency - {{ $('Split Data Streams').item.json['welcome-data'].company_name }}! üöÄ",
  "data": {
    "client_name": "{{ $('Split Data Streams').item.json['welcome-data'].client_name }}",
    "company_name": "{{ $('Split Data Streams').item.json['welcome-data'].company_name }}",
    "account_manager": "{{ $('Split Data Streams').item.json['welcome-data'].account_manager }}",
    "welcome_message": "We're thrilled to welcome you to our family! Our team is already working on setting up everything you need for a successful partnership.",
    "next_steps": [
      "Your dedicated client portal will be ready within 2 hours",
      "You'll receive portal access credentials via email",
      "Our team will contact you within 24 hours to schedule your discovery call",
      "Please review the attached onboarding questionnaire"
    ],
    "team_contact": {
      "account_manager": "{{ $('Split Data Streams').item.json['welcome-data'].account_manager }}",
      "email": "{{ $('Split Data Streams').item.json['welcome-data'].account_manager }}@agency.com",
      "phone": "+1-555-0123"
    },
    "portal_preview": "Your portal will be available at: portal.agency.com/{{ $('Split Data Streams').item.json['portal-data'].subdomain }}",
    "attachments": [
      "onboarding_questionnaire.pdf",
      "getting_started_guide.pdf",
      "service_overview.pdf"
    ]
  },
  "priority": "high",
  "track_engagement": true
}

={
  "template": "portal_access_ready",
  "to": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.email }}",
  "subject": "üéâ Your Client Portal is Ready!",
  "data": {
    "client_name": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.name }}",
    "company_name": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.company }}",
    "portal_url": "https://portal.agency.com/{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.company.toLowerCase().replace(/[^a-z0-9]/g, '-') }}",
    "login_instructions": "Simply click the link above and enter your email address. We'll send you a secure login link instantly.",
    "features_available": [
      "Real-time project progress tracking",
      "Performance analytics and reports",
      "Direct team communication",
      "Invoice and billing management",
      "Document library access"
    ],
    "next_steps": [
      "Explore your new client portal",
      "Complete the onboarding questionnaire",
      "Schedule your strategy discovery call",
      "Review your project timeline"
    ],
    "support_contact": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.team_assignments.account_manager }}@agency.com"
  }
}
